hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Amr ibn al-'As: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Knowledge has three categories; anything else is extra; a precise verse, or an established sunnah (practice), or a firm obligatory duty

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَعْلِيمِ الْفَرَائِضِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Teaching The Knowledge Of Inheritance
